statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{16 \, x^{3} + 12 \, x^{2} - 20 \, x - 12 , -x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + x + 3 , -9 \, x^{3} - 11 \, x^{2} + 11 \, x + 9 , 4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 3 , 9 \, x^{3} + 11 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x - 9\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
